property.name: helper
property.desc: The jQuery object representing the helper being sorted

property.name: item
property.desc: The jQuery object representing the current dragged element

property.name: offset
property.desc: The current absolute position of the helper represented as { top, left }

property.name: position
property.desc: The current position of the helper represented as { top, left }

property.name: originalPosition
property.desc: The original position of the element represented as { top, left }

property.name: sender
property.desc: The sortable that the item comes from if moving from one sortable to another

property.name: placeholder
property.desc: The jQuery object representing the element being used as a placeholder.
